title: Hackathon 2025
description: A 24-hour coding marathon where students showcase skills, build apps, and compete for exciting prizes.

title: Cultural Night
description: An evening filled with music, dance, and drama performances celebrating the spirit of cultural diversity.

title: Cricket Tournament
description: Inter-college cricket championship where teams battle for glory, trophies, and thrilling audience moments.

title: Guest Lecture on AI
description: Explore the future of Artificial Intelligence with industry experts sharing insights, trends, and innovations.

title: Music Festival
description: A vibrant day of live bands, DJs, and performances that bring energy, rhythm, and joy to the campus crowd.

title: Basketball League
description: Exciting inter-university basketball matches where players show their skills and teams fight for the title.

title: Photography Exhibition
description: An exhibition showcasing creative photography by students, capturing stories, emotions, and campus memories.

title: Robotics Workshop
description: Hands-on robotics workshop where students design, code, and build robots while learning real-world skills.

title: Drama Play
description: A stage play performed by the drama society, blending acting, storytelling, and entertainment for all students.

title: Coding Bootcamp
description: An intensive bootcamp teaching web and app development where learners practice coding through real projects.

title: Science Fair
description: A showcase of innovative science projects and experiments where students present creative research ideas.

title: Football Cup
description: Thrilling inter-department football matches where teams compete with passion, energy, and team spirit on field.

title: Debate Competition
description: Battle of ideas where sharp minds debate on current topics, showcasing logic, reasoning, and public speaking.

title: New Year Gala
description: Celebrate the new year with live performances, great food, fun activities, and dazzling fireworks at midnight.
